name: Rainfall (WIP)
description:
Rainfall

Controls:

W/D Key: Move Left/Right
Spacebar: Jump
Escape: Reset scene

Work in progress. Web version is a little borked, please download for the best experience. 

Here are some things you can try in this demo:

  • Get wet in the rain, dry off by the fire. 
  • Push the fire into the rain
  • Push the wet box by the fire
  • Clear the small wall by moving the box
  • Enjoy the sound of the rain
  • Splash around when wet, normal footsteps when dry

All game objects are affected by water and temperature. High temperature will make an object lose wetness quicker. 

Future additions:

  • Holdable objects that will change how the rain affects the player (i.e. umbrella)
  • Cooking by the fire
  • Delivering items through the rain
  • Cave decorating

Let me know if you have any suggestions!
